description:
GuessTheRandomNumberChallenge.guess(uint8) (shared/bad_randomness/guess_the_random_number/guess_the_random_number_4round.sol#18-25) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(2000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/guess_the_random_number/guess_the_random_number_4round.sol#22)

GuessTheRandomNumberChallenge.guess(uint8) (shared/bad_randomness/guess_the_random_number/guess_the_random_number_4round.sol#18-25) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- n == answer (shared/bad_randomness/guess_the_random_number/guess_the_random_number_4round.sol#21)
